overview:
Chris is Canvas’s VP of Web Development ultimately guiding the development of our unique web based tools. Prior to Canvas, Chris has held lead developer and architect positions with a number of leading software and consulting firms developing solutions on dozens of platforms and languages. Chris was CTO of Zua Scene when his company partnered with VeriSign to develop what would ultimately become the Motorola Wireless Solution of the Year.

Chris is a graduate of Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University (B.S. Computer Science).
